title: Gloria Nana Ama Boadi
text:
About
I am a Graduate student at the Memorial University of Newfoundlands studying M.A. Economics.. My research program is broad and covers a myriad of areas in applied and theoretical economics, health policy, nutrition, chronic disease, and statistics. My current research is focused on the economic development of Canadian First Nations communities through improvements in water infrastructure, nutrition, and overall health
